00039 CNLog2RatioEngine * CNLog2RatioEngine::FromBase(BaseEngine *engine)
00040 {
00041     if (engine != NULL && engine->getEngineName() == CNLog2RatioEngine::EngineName())
00042         return (CNLog2RatioEngine *)engine;
00043     return NULL;
00044 }

00077 /**
00078  * @brief Define the options used by the log2 ratio engine.
00079  */
00080 void CNLog2RatioEngine::defineOptions()
00081 {
00082   defineOptionSection("Input Options");
00083   defineOption("", "probeset-ids", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00084                      "Tab delimited file with column 'probeset_id' specifying probesets to summarize.",
00085                      "");
00086   // while this isn't defined as a "shared" option, we assume it could be
00087   defineOption("","annotation-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00088                      "NetAffx Annotation file.",
00089                      "");
00090   // while this isn't defined as a "shared" option, we assume it could be
00091   defineOption("","expr-summary-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00092                      "Expression Summary Table file.",
00093                      "");
00094   // while this isn't defined as a "shared" option, we assume it could be
00095   defineOption("","genotype-calls-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00096                      "Genotype Calls Table file.",
00097                      "");
00098   // while this isn't defined as a "shared" option, we assume it could be
00099   defineOption("","genotype-confidences-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00100                      "Genotype Confidences Table file.",
00101                      "");
00102   // while this isn't defined as a "shared" option, we assume it could be
00103   defineOption("","genotype-report-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00104                      "Genotype Report Table file.",
00105                      "");
00106   // while this isn't defined as a "shared" option, we assume it could be
00107   defineOption("", "reference-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Copy Number Reference file.", "");
00108 
00109   defineOptionSection("Output Options");
00110   defineOption("", "call-copynumber-engine", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT, "Call the copy number engine to output CNCHP files.", "true");
00111   defineOption("", "log2ratio-hdf5-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT, "Write intermediate output in HDF5 format.", "false");
00112   defineOption("", "log2ratio-text-output", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT, "Write intermediate output in ASCII Text format.", "false");
00113 
00114   defineOptionSection("Analysis Options");
00115 
00116   defineOptionSection("Advanced Options");
00117   defineOption("","xChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "X Chromosome", "24");
00118   defineOption("","yChromosome", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "Y Chromosome", "25");
00119   defineOption("", "gc-correction-bin-count", PgOpt::INT_OPT, "The number of bins to use for GC content.", "25");
00120 
00121 
00122   defineOptionSection("Execution Control Options");
00123   defineOption("", "mem-usage", PgOpt::INT_OPT,
00124                     "How many MB of memory to use for this run.",
00125                     "0");
00126 
00127   defineSharedOptions();
00128 }

00132                     "create-reference",
00133                     "false");
00134   defineSharedStates();

00137 /**
00138  * @brief Define options used by both the CNLog2RatioEngine and the CNWorkflowEngine
00139  */
00140 void CNLog2RatioEngine::defineSharedOptions()
00141 {
00142     m_pEngine->defineOptionSection("Additional CNLog2RatioEngine Options");
00143     m_pEngine->defOptMult("a", "analysis", PgOpt::STRING_OPT,
00144                    "String representing analysis pathway desired.",
00145                    "");
00146     m_pEngine->defineOption("", "delete-files", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT,
00147                     "Delete extra output files after the run has completed.",
00148                     "false");
00149     m_pEngine->defineOption("", "log2-input", PgOpt::BOOL_OPT, "Input Allele Summaries are in log2.", "false");
00150 
00151     m_pEngine->defineOption("", "gc-content-override-file", PgOpt::STRING_OPT, "Input file used to override the GC content read from the annotation file (Two columns with header line, ProbeSetName/GCContent).", "");
00152 
00153     m_objCNAnalysisEngine.setEngine(m_pEngine);
00154     m_objCNAnalysisEngine.defineSharedOptions();
00155 }
00156 
00157 void CNLog2RatioEngine::defineSharedStates()
00158 {
00159     if(!m_SharedStateIsDefined) {
00160         m_objCNAnalysisEngine.setEngine(m_pEngine);
00161         m_objCNAnalysisEngine.defineSharedStates();
00162         m_SharedStateIsDefined = true;
00163     }
00164 }

00167 /**
00168  * @brief Check to see if the options used by the copy number engine are valid.
00169  */
00170 void CNLog2RatioEngine::checkOptionsImp()
00171 {
00172     defineStates();
00173 
00174     setLibFileOpt("probeset-ids");
00175     setLibFileOpt("annotation-file");
00176     setLibFileOpt("reference-file");
00177     m_pEngine->setLibFileOpt("gc-content-override-file");
00178 
00179     std::vector<std::string>& analysis = m_pEngine->getOptVector("analysis");
00180 
00181     if(analysis.size() == 0) {
00182         analysis.push_back("log2-ratio");
00183         analysis.push_back("allelic-difference");
00184     }
00185     if (m_pEngine == this)
00186     {
00187         if (getOpt("set-analysis-name") == "") {setOpt("set-analysis-name", "CN5");}
00188         if (getOpt("expr-summary-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a expr-summary-file."));}
00189         if (getOpt("genotype-calls-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a genotype-calls-file."));}
00190         if (getOpt("genotype-confidences-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a genotype-confidences-file."));}
00191         if (getOpt("genotype-report-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a genoptype-report-file."));}
00192     }
00193     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("annotation-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a netaffx annotation-file."));}
00194     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file") == "") {throw(Except("Must specify a reference-file."));}
00195 
00196     AffxString strReferenceFileName = m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file");
00197 
00198     if (Fs::fileExists(strReferenceFileName))
00199     {
00200         if (affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strReferenceFileName)) {Verbose::out(1, "Input reference is in HDF5 format.");}
00201         else {Verbose::out(1, "Input reference is in text format.");}
00202         if ((affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strReferenceFileName)) && (getOptBool("log2ratio-text-output")))
00203         {
00204             Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Input reference-file is in HDF5 format, overriding log2ratio-text-output to log2ratio-hdf5-output.");
00205             setOpt("log2ratio-hdf5-output", "true");
00206             setOpt("log2ratio-text-output", "false");
00207         }
00208         if ((!affx::File5_File::isHdf5file(strReferenceFileName)) && (getOptBool("log2ratio-hdf5-output")))
00209         {
00210             Verbose::out(1, "WARNING: Input reference-file is in text format, overriding log2ratio-hdf5-output to log2ratio-text-output.");
00211             setOpt("log2ratio-hdf5-output", "false");
00212             setOpt("log2ratio-text-output", "true");
00213         }
00214     }
00215 
00216     m_objCNAnalysisEngine.checkOptions();
00217 }
00218 
00219 /**
00220  * @brief Run the copy number ratio engine. The copy number ratio engine will inturn call the copy number engine.
00221  */
00222 void CNLog2RatioEngine::runImp()
00223 {
00224     try
00225     {
00226         m_data.setEngine(m_pEngine);
00227         uint64_t memAvail = ::getDouble(m_pEngine->getOpt("free-mem-at-start"));
00228         if (memAvail >= (2000 * MEGABYTE))
00229         {
00230             m_pEngine->setOpt("mem-usage", "2000");
00231         }
00232         else
00233         {
00234             int iMemUsage = (memAvail / MEGABYTE);
00235             m_pEngine->setOpt("mem-usage", ::getInt(iMemUsage));
00236         }
00237 
00238         m_objCNAnalysisEngine.setEngine(m_pEngine);
00239         m_objCNAnalysisEngine.createAnalysis();
00240 
00241         m_data.loadAnnotation(true);
00242         if (!m_data.loadModelFile(m_pEngine->getOpt("reference-file"))) {throw(Except("No reference file to process."));}
00243 
00244         m_iProbeSetCount = m_data.getProbeSets()->getCount();
00245         m_iExperimentCount = m_data.loadExperiments(m_pEngine->getOpt("expr-summary-file"));
00246         if (m_pEngine->isOptDefined("geno-qc-file"))
00247         {
00248             m_data.loadQCMetrics(m_pEngine->getOpt("geno-qc-file"));
00249         }
00250         if (m_iExperimentCount == 0) {throw(Except("No experiments to process."));}
00251 
00252         if (!determineMemoryUsage()) {return;}
00253         if (!processData()) {return;}
00254 
00255         m_data.clear();
00256 
00257     }
00258     catch(...)
00259     {
00260         m_data.clear();
00261         throw;
00262     }
00263 }
00264 
00265 /**
00266  * Guesstimate the maximum number of probe sets we can load for all experiments.
00267  * Guesstimate the maximum number of experiments we can load for all probe sets.
00268  * @return bool - true if successful
00269  */
00270 bool CNLog2RatioEngine::determineMemoryUsage()
00271 {
00272     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioEngine::determineMemoryUsage");
00273     bool bCyto2 = ((m_pEngine->isOptDefined("cyto2")) && (m_pEngine->getOptBool("cyto2")));
00274     int iMemUsage = m_pEngine->getOptInt("mem-usage");
00275     int iMBUsedForPreAllocation = (int)((20 * m_iProbeSetCount) / 1000000.0);
00276     if (bCyto2) {iMBUsedForPreAllocation = (int)((8 * m_iProbeSetCount) / 1000000.0);}
00277     int iMBUsedForProbeSetList = (int)((77 * m_iProbeSetCount) / 1000000.0);
00278     int iMBUsedForExperimentList = (int)((58 * m_iExperimentCount) / 1000000.0);
00279     int iMBUsedForSnpArray = 140;
00280     int iMBFudgeFactor = 25;
00281 
00282     m_iProbeSetsToProcess = (int)((((iMemUsage - iMBUsedForPreAllocation - iMBUsedForProbeSetList - iMBUsedForExperimentList - iMBUsedForSnpArray - iMBFudgeFactor) * 1000000.0) / 21.0) / m_iExperimentCount);
00283     if (m_iProbeSetsToProcess <= 0) {throw(Except("Not enough memory to run application. ProbeSetsToProcess = " + ::getInt(m_iProbeSetsToProcess)));}
00284     if (m_iProbeSetsToProcess > m_iProbeSetCount) {m_iProbeSetsToProcess = m_iProbeSetCount;}
00285 
00286     m_iExperimentsToProcess = (int)((((iMemUsage - iMBUsedForPreAllocation - iMBUsedForProbeSetList - iMBUsedForExperimentList - iMBUsedForSnpArray - iMBFudgeFactor) * 1000000.0) / 21.0) / m_iProbeSetCount);
00287     if (m_iExperimentsToProcess <= 0) {throw(Except("Not enough memory to run application. ExperimentsToProcess = " + ::getInt(m_iExperimentsToProcess)));}
00288     if (m_iExperimentsToProcess > m_iExperimentCount) {m_iExperimentsToProcess = m_iExperimentCount;}
00289     Verbose::out(1, ::getInt(m_iExperimentsToProcess) + " ExperimentsToProcess out of " + ::getInt(m_iExperimentCount));
00290     return true;
00291 }
00292 
00293 /**
00294  * @brief Process the data.
00295  * @return bool - true if successful
00296  */
00297 bool CNLog2RatioEngine::processData()
00298 {
00299     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioEngine::processData");
00300     m_data.setLog2RatioEngine(true);
00301     int iExperimentIndex = 0;
00302 
00303     // Read the gender calls from the report file.
00304     m_data.loadGenotypeReport(m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-report-file"));
00305 
00306     // Calculate the allelic differences and write them in transposed binary format.
00307 //    Verbose::out(3, "ExperimentsToProcess = " + ::getInt(m_iExperimentsToProcess) + ", ProbeSetCount = " + ::getInt(m_iProbeSetCount));
00308     bool bFailed = true;
00309     int iMB = 80;
00310     while ((bFailed) && (iMB > 0))
00311     {
00312         try
00313         {
00314         Verbose::out(3, "AAlleleEstimates Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iExperimentsToProcess * m_iProbeSetCount * 4));
00315         m_data.getAAlleleEstimates()->initialize(m_iExperimentsToProcess, m_iProbeSetCount);
00316         Verbose::out(3, "BAlleleEstimates Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iExperimentsToProcess * m_iProbeSetCount * 4));
00317         m_data.getBAlleleEstimates()->initialize(m_iExperimentsToProcess, m_iProbeSetCount);
00318         Verbose::out(3, "GenotypeCalls Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iExperimentsToProcess * m_iProbeSetCount * 1));
00319         m_data.getGenotypeCalls()->initialize(m_iExperimentsToProcess, m_iProbeSetCount);
00320         Verbose::out(3, "GenotypeConfidences Allocation = " + ::getInt(m_iExperimentsToProcess * m_iProbeSetCount * 4));
00321         m_data.getGenotypeConfidences()->initialize(m_iExperimentsToProcess, m_iProbeSetCount);
00322         Verbose::out(3, "Done with Allocations.");
00323         bFailed = false;
00324         } catch(...) {bFailed = true;}
00325         if (bFailed)
00326         {
00327             Verbose::out(3, "Memory allocations failed. Trying again...");
00328             iMB -= 10;
00329             m_iExperimentsToProcess = (int)Min((double)m_iExperimentsToProcess, ((iMB * 1000000.0) / m_iProbeSetCount / 4.0));
00330         }
00331     }
00332     if (iMB <= 0) {throw(Except("Memory allocations failed."));}
00333     iExperimentIndex = 0;
00334     Verbose::progressBegin(1, "CNLog2RatioEngine::processData() ", m_iExperimentCount, 1, m_iExperimentCount);
00335     while (iExperimentIndex < m_iExperimentCount)
00336     {
00337         if (!m_data.loadAlleleEstimatesByExperiment(m_pEngine->getOpt("expr-summary-file"), iExperimentIndex, m_iExperimentsToProcess)) {return false;}
00338         if (!m_data.loadGenotypeCallsByExperiment(m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-calls-file"), iExperimentIndex, m_iExperimentsToProcess)) {return false;}
00339         if (!m_data.loadGenotypeConfidencesByExperiment(m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-confidences-file"), iExperimentIndex, m_iExperimentsToProcess)) {return false;}
00340 
00341         for (int iColIndex = iExperimentIndex; (iColIndex < Min((iExperimentIndex + m_iExperimentsToProcess), m_data.getExperiments()->getCount())); iColIndex++)
00342         {
00343             Verbose::out(1, "Processing sample: " + Fs::basename(m_data.getExperiments()->getAt(iColIndex)->getExperimentName()));
00344             transferProbeSetData(iColIndex - iExperimentIndex);
00345             if (getOptBool("call-copynumber-engine")) {callCNAnalysisEngine(iColIndex);}
00346             if (getOptBool("log2ratio-text-output")) {writeOutputText(iColIndex);}
00347             if (getOptBool("log2ratio-hdf5-output")) {writeOutputHdf5(iColIndex);}
00348             Verbose::progressStep(1);
00349         }
00350 
00351         iExperimentIndex += m_iExperimentsToProcess;
00352     }
00353     Verbose::progressEnd(1, "Done");
00354     m_data.dumpGenotypeReport(m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-report-file"));
00355 
00356     // Free up some memory.
00357     m_data.getAAlleleEstimates()->initialize(1);
00358     m_data.getBAlleleEstimates()->initialize(1);
00359     m_data.getGenotypeCalls()->initialize(1);
00360     m_data.getGenotypeConfidences()->initialize(1);
00361 
00362     if (getOptBool("delete-files")) {deleteFiles();}
00363 
00364     return true;
00365 }
00366 
00367 /**
00368  * @brief Initialize the ProbeSet Data for the next run of analysis.
00369  * @param int - The experiment index
00370  */
00371 void CNLog2RatioEngine::transferProbeSetData(int iExperimentIndex)
00372 {
00373     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioEngine::transferProbeSetDataToSnps");
00374     CNProbeSetArray* parProbeSets = m_data.getProbeSets();
00375 
00376     for (int iIndex = 0; (iIndex < parProbeSets->getCount()); iIndex++)
00377     {
00378         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = parProbeSets->getAt(iIndex);
00379         pobjProbeSet->setAAlleleSignal(m_data.getAAlleleEstimates()->get(iExperimentIndex, iIndex));
00380         pobjProbeSet->setBAlleleSignal(m_data.getBAlleleEstimates()->get(iExperimentIndex, iIndex));
00381         pobjProbeSet->setGenotypeCall(m_data.getGenotypeCalls()->get(iExperimentIndex, iIndex));
00382         pobjProbeSet->setGenotypeConfidence(m_data.getGenotypeConfidences()->get(iExperimentIndex, iIndex));
00383         pobjProbeSet->setCNState(0);
00384         pobjProbeSet->setSmoothedLog2Ratio(0);
00385         pobjProbeSet->setLoh(0);
00386     }
00387 }
00388 
00389 /**
00390  * @brief Run the CNAnalysisEngine
00391  * @param int - The experiment index
00392  */
00393 void CNLog2RatioEngine::callCNAnalysisEngine(int iExperimentIndex)
00394 {
00395     CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = m_data.getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00396     m_objCNAnalysisEngine.process(*pobjExperiment, *m_data.getProbeSetsAlternateSort());
00397 }

00399 /**
00400  * @brief Ouptut the SNP data in ASCII text format.
00401  * @param int - The experiment index to process.
00402  * @return bool - true if successful
00403  */
00404 bool CNLog2RatioEngine::writeOutputText(int iExperimentIndex)
00405 {
00406     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioEngine::writeOutputText");
00407     CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = m_data.getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00408     AffxString strFileName;
00409     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name") != "")
00410     {
00411         strFileName = Fs::join(m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir"),
00412                            m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name") + "." + pobjExperiment->getExperimentName() + ".txt");
00413     }
00414     else
00415     {
00416         strFileName = Fs::join(m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir"),
00417                            pobjExperiment->getExperimentName() + ".txt");
00418     }
00419     affx::TsvFile tsv;
00420 
00421     // write out the options used.
00422     tsv.addHeader("guid", affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00423 
00424     // dump options
00425     vector<string> optionNames;
00426     m_pEngine->getOptionNames(optionNames,1);
00427     for(int i=0; i< optionNames.size(); i++) {
00428       std::string name = optionNames[i];
00429       std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name,1);
00430       if (vals.size() > 1) {
00431         for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++) {
00432           tsv.addHeader("affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-" + name, vals[j]);
00433         }
00434       }
00435       else {
00436         tsv.addHeader("affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-" + name,  m_pEngine->getOpt(name,1));
00437       }
00438     }
00439     tsv.writeTsv_v1(strFileName);
00440 
00441     // Normally we don't have tables concatenated in this fashion.
00442     // There is a header row, record row, header row, records.
00443     // TSV does not support this so just write out the ad hoc lines.
00444     std::stringstream lineSStr;
00445     lineSStr << "experiment\tMadDiffCN\tIqr\tMeanAbsRle\tMedianAutosomeMedian\tGender\tGCCorrectionSize" << std::endl;
00446     tsv.write_str(lineSStr.str());
00447     lineSStr.str("");
00448     lineSStr << pobjExperiment->getExperimentName() + "\t" + ::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMadDiffCN(), 6) + "\t" + ::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getIqr(), 6) + "\t" + ::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMeanAbsRle(), 6) + "\t" + ::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getMedianAutosomeMedian(), 6) + "\t" + pobjExperiment->getCNCallGender() + "\t" + ::getDouble(pobjExperiment->getGCCorrectionMetric(), 6) << std::endl;
00449     tsv.write_str(lineSStr.str());
00450     lineSStr.str("");
00451     lineSStr << "probeset_id\tChromosome\tPosition\tLog2Ratio\tAllelicDifference\tGenotypeCall\tGenotypeConfidence\tChrXPar1\tChrXPar2" << std::endl;
00452     tsv.write_str(lineSStr.str());
00453     
00454     for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0, iCidx =0 ; (iProbeSetIndex < m_data.getProbeSets()->getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++, iCidx = 0)
00455     {
00456         CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_data.getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00457         tsv.set(0, iCidx++, pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName()); 
00458         tsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt(pobjProbeSet->getChromosome())); 
00459         tsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt((int)pobjProbeSet->getPosition())); 
00460         tsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio(), 10));
00461         tsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(pobjProbeSet->getAllelicDifference(), 10));
00462         tsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt((int)pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall())); 
00463         tsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getDouble(pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeConfidence(), 10)); 
00464         tsv.set(0, iCidx++, ::getInt((int)pobjProbeSet->isPseudoAutosomalRegion()));
00465         tsv.set(0, iCidx++, "0"); 
00466         tsv.writeLevel(0);
00467     }
00468 
00469     tsv.clear();
00470     return true;
00471 }
00472 
00473 /**
00474  * @brief Ouptut the SNP data in HDF5 fformat.
00475  * @param int - The experiment index to process.
00476  * @return bool - true if successful
00477  */
00478 bool CNLog2RatioEngine::writeOutputHdf5(int iExperimentIndex)
00479 {
00480     Verbose::out(3, "CNLog2RatioEngine::writeOutputHdf5");
00481     CNExperiment* pobjExperiment = m_data.getExperiments()->getAt(iExperimentIndex);
00482     AffxString strFileName;
00483     if (m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name") != "")
00484     {
00485         strFileName = Fs::join(m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir"),
00486                            m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name") + "." + pobjExperiment->getExperimentName() + ".a5");
00487     }
00488     else
00489     {
00490         strFileName = Fs::join(m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir"),
00491                            pobjExperiment->getExperimentName() + ".a5");
00492     }
00493     try
00494     {
00495         affx::File5_File file5;
00496         file5.open(strFileName, affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00497 
00498         affx::File5_Tsv* tsv5 = file5.openTsv("CNLog2Ratio_Parameters", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00499         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "Parameter", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 1024);
00500         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%guid=" + affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid()); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00501 
00502         // dump options
00503         vector<string> optionNames;
00504         m_pEngine->getOptionNames(optionNames,1);
00505         for(int i=0; i< optionNames.size(); i++) {
00506             std::string name = optionNames[i];
00507             std::vector<std::string> vals = m_pEngine->getOptVector(name,1);
00508             if (vals.size() > 1)
00509             {
00510                 for(int j=0; j< vals.size(); j++)
00511                 {
00512                     std::string val = vals[j];
00513                     tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00514                 }
00515             }
00516             else
00517             {
00518                 std::string val = m_pEngine->getOpt(name,1);
00519                 tsv5->set_string(0, 0, "#%affymetrix-algorithm-param-apt-" + name + "=" + val); tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00520             }
00521         }
00522 
00523         tsv5->close();
00524         delete tsv5;
00525 
00526         tsv5 = file5.openTsv("CNLog2Ratio_Experiments", affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00527         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "experiment", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, pobjExperiment->getExperimentName().length());
00528         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "MadDiffCN", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
00529         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "Iqr", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
00530         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "MeanAbsRle", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
00531         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 4, "MedianAutosomeMedian", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
00532         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 5, "Gender", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, 20);
00533         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 6, "GCCorrectionSize", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
00534         tsv5->set_string(0, 0, pobjExperiment->getExperimentName());
00535         tsv5->set_d(0, 1, pobjExperiment->getMadDiffCN());
00536         tsv5->set_d(0, 2, pobjExperiment->getIqr());
00537         tsv5->set_d(0, 3, pobjExperiment->getMeanAbsRle());
00538         tsv5->set_d(0, 4, pobjExperiment->getMedianAutosomeMedian());
00539         tsv5->set_string(0, 5, pobjExperiment->getCNCallGender());
00540         tsv5->set_d(0, 6, pobjExperiment->getGCCorrectionMetric());
00541         tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00542         tsv5->close();
00543         delete tsv5;
00544 
00545         int iMaxProbeSetNameLength = 0;
00546         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < m_data.getProbeSets()->getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++)
00547         {
00548             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_data.getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00549             iMaxProbeSetNameLength = Max(iMaxProbeSetNameLength, (int)pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName().length());
00550         }
00551         tsv5 = file5.openTsv("CNLog2Ratio_" + pobjExperiment->getExperimentName(), affx::FILE5_REPLACE);
00552         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 0, "probeset_id", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_STRING, iMaxProbeSetNameLength);
00553         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 1, "Chromosome", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT, 0);
00554         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 2, "Position", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT, 0);
00555         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 3, "Log2Ratio", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
00556         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 4, "AllelicDifference", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
00557         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 5, "GenotypeCall", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT, 0);
00558         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 6, "GenotypeConfidence", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_DOUBLE, 0);
00559         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 7, "ChrXPar1", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT, 0);
00560         tsv5->defineColumn(0, 8, "ChrXPar2", affx::FILE5_DTYPE_INT, 0);
00561         for (int iProbeSetIndex = 0; (iProbeSetIndex < m_data.getProbeSets()->getCount()); iProbeSetIndex++)
00562         {
00563             CNProbeSet* pobjProbeSet = m_data.getProbeSets()->getAt(iProbeSetIndex);
00564             tsv5->set_string(0, 0, pobjProbeSet->getProbeSetName());
00565             tsv5->set_i(0, 1, (int)pobjProbeSet->getChromosome());
00566             tsv5->set_i(0, 2, pobjProbeSet->getPosition());
00567             tsv5->set_d(0, 3, pobjProbeSet->getLog2Ratio());
00568             tsv5->set_d(0, 4, pobjProbeSet->getAllelicDifference());
00569             tsv5->set_i(0, 5, (int)pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeCall());
00570             tsv5->set_d(0, 6, pobjProbeSet->getGenotypeConfidence());
00571             tsv5->set_i(0, 7, (pobjProbeSet->isPseudoAutosomalRegion() ? 1 : 0));
00572             tsv5->set_i(0, 8, 0);
00573             tsv5->writeLevel(0);
00574         }
00575         tsv5->close();
00576         delete tsv5;
00577         file5.close();
00578     } catch(...) {throw(Except("Cannot open file: " + strFileName));}
00579     return true;
00580 }
00581 
00582 /**
00583  * @brief Delete temporary files
00584  */
00585 void CNLog2RatioEngine::deleteFiles()
00586 {
00587     try{::H5close();} catch(...) {} // Make sure HDF5 releases the files so that we can delete them.
00588     Fs::rm(Fs::dirname(Fs::join(m_pEngine->getOpt("expr-summary-file"),
00589                                                      m_pEngine->getOpt("set-analysis-name") + ".normalized-summary.a5")), false);
00590     Fs::rm(m_pEngine->getOpt("expr-summary-file"), false);
00591     Fs::rm(m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-calls-file"), false);
00592     Fs::rm(m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-confidences-file"), false);
00593     Fs::rm(m_pEngine->getOpt("genotype-report-file"), false);
00594     Fs::rm(Fs::join(m_pEngine->getOpt("out-dir"),m_pEngine->getOpt("expr-summary-file") + ".CopyNumber.Report.txt"), false);
00595 }
